Measure Class Reference

Measure API. More...

#include <Measure.hpp>

Detailed Description

Access various power metrics such as battery voltage and current.

The following values are available:

  • Battery Voltage (2 values)
  • Battery Current
  • LED voltage
  • LED current
  • LED temperature
  • Ambient light sensor
